full_summary:
Decission Writing Workshop
================================
### Invitation to Tender

#### Notice Details

* **Reference:** CB-852-77427172
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Solicitation Number:** 84084-23-0091
* **Publication Date:** October 20, 2023
* **Deadline for Submission:** November 10, 2023, at 16:00:00
* **Status:** Expired
* **Category:** Service Contract
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Tender Overview

The Canada Energy Regulator invites proposals for the provision of decision writing workshops tailored to the needs of Commissioners, legal, and technical staff at the Regulator. The contract duration is expected to be from the date of award until March 31, 2024.

### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be required to deliver a tailored workshop to facilitate the development of effective decision writing skills among Regulator staff. The workshops will be conducted in English.

### Key Tender Details

* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** Canada Energy Regulator
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Ngan Loi
	+ Email: [ngan.loi@cer-rec.ca](mailto:ngan.loi@cer-rec.ca)
	+ Phone: (403) 389-3354

### Resources

The tender documents are available for download at the following links:

* [English] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22773/84084-23-0091-rfp-%28en_0.pdf>
* [English, Amendment 1] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22773/84084-23-0091-rfp-amendment-01-%28en.pdf>
* [French] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22773/84084-23-0091-rfp-%28fr_0.pdf>
* [French, Amendment 1] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22773/84084-23-0091-rfp-amendment-01-%28fr.pdf>

Note:
* The tender deadline has expired.
* Due to the deadline expiration
